q1: How many times did Pele play for Brazil?
a1: Pele played a total of 92 games for Brazil.

a2: If not the best of all time, he is close to the top.

a3: He is on par with Ronado.
q4: Do you think Ronaldo is as good as Pele?
a4: Not quite, hard to tell with the difference in play styles.
